description: [Ember Bear](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1003) uses valid network credentials gathered through credential harvesting to move laterally within victim networks, often employing the [Impacket](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0357) framework to do so.(Citation: Cadet Blizzard emerges as novel threat actor)

external_references.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence. (2023, June 14). Cadet Blizzard emerges as a novel and distinct Russian threat actor. Retrieved July 10, 2023.
external_references.source_name: Cadet Blizzard emerges as novel threat actor
